comments: This class was not hard at all the essays were a bit confusing but overall fairly easy. She is very helpful and if you go to class you receive extra credit! The test were basically the study guides!

I got an A in the class, but that\'s because the class is easy, not because I learned something. She acts like coming to teach is the worst thing ever. The TAs are fairly helpful. DO NOT buy the books as they are not tested on, not referenced in class, and a general waste of money.

The class is difficult because it is a difficult subject. But she and her TA\'s are very helpful with the assignments when asked. My major concern is that there is no general textbook for the class to learn things off of for the assignments, so we must rely completely on in class lectures and appointments with her and the TA\'s if your confused

cannot hear her when she talks at all. And i sit in the 3rd row of class. The class is pretty confusing and she doesnt really help clear things up. It\'s almost as if she doesnt want to be there as much as i don\'t
